title: Congratz
body:
Mark / Dash

    We like a good snowball fight, but things were getting a little ridiculous. Our primary goal was to give bruiser/tanky types the balls (snowballs, man) they needed to get into the fight, but when you see Ashe running Mark/Dash trying to snipe off a squishy backliner, something's probably up. 

COOLDOWN 20 seconds ⇒ 40 seconds
DAMAGE SPLIT Damage is split between Mark and Dash by 33.3%/66.% ⇒ 50%/50%
HOLY THAT WAS A LONG RANGE 2500 ⇒ 1600

So after screwing the format with this garbage you finally figured out it was unbalanced.....
What f*#%ing morons are on the dev team for this? Was it even tested before it was introduced?
Better scoop up some more idiots to test the next stupid idea you have to completely wreck a format.

replies.body: Dude, it's ARAM. If you want balance play a real game mode.
Pepper get it? ( I know i'm hilarious).

And this boys and girls is 'salt'. It can be found in all sorts of forms, in this case a angry little boy who is upset about a game. Do not respond to it for that fuels its anger causing the salt to grow.
yes young one, a salt tree
